name: Help Me Delivery
desc: Giving vulnerable populations an easy platform to identify local shops, build shareable shopping lists that they can easily share with friends, family or trusted connections on social media.

name: WeeGlobe
desc: WeeGlobe as it stands is a proof of concept that we hope illustrates a glaring deficiency with online education that has come to light with so many households in mandated or voluntary quarantine.

name: Help Supply
desc: Help Supply is the simplest way for our highly stressed healthcare workers to name all their needs, from groceries to pet care to mental health, and connect to the people who can help them.
creators: David Zangwill, Johnson Fung, Caleb Yarian, Eric Alper

name: Covexit
desc: An online marketplace exclusively for local stores with door-to-door delivery to customers
creators: Fabian Katz, Marco Schmid, Philipp Veller, Ed Rivas + 9

name: Predict COVID
desc: Predict the 2020 COVID-19 pandemic outbreak by comparing countries with a live-updating, interactive data visualization.

name: Tutorbook
desc: Virtual student support (through online peer-to-peer tutoring) for schools closed due to COVID-19.
creators: Nicholas Chiang, Kartik Choudhary, Eric Feltgen, Viki Pro
